document_data.name: Maranta
document_data.mainbody: '''Maranta''' was a mute [[cleric]] in [[Daggerford]] around [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Activities:
Maranta was the cleric of a unidentified nature goodness. However, a powerful [[curse]] robbed from her her voice. She couldn't regain it even with the help of [[Khelben Arunsun]], [[Alustriel]], and two others of the [[Seven Sisters]]. Alustriel supposed the curse was the work of [[Malar]].

She lived in a house in the southeast section of Daggerford in between [[Water Street]] and [[Kaoth Alley]] near the [[River Gate]].{{Cite interactive atlas|3990 Daggerford}}
